**The Mantle of Knowledge** was the [Monk](/wiki/Monk "Monk") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [NetHack Plus](/wiki/NetHack_Plus "NetHack Plus") and [SLASH 6](/wiki/SLASH_6 "SLASH 6"). Its base item was a [helm of brilliance](/wiki/Helm_of_brilliance "Helm of brilliance").

In addition to increasing the wearer's [wisdom](/wiki/Wisdom "Wisdom") and [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence"), as a helm of brilliance, the Mantle granted [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") and [extrinsic](/wiki/Extrinsic "Extrinsic") [ESP](/wiki/ESP "ESP") while carried. When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke"), the Mantle gave an [energy](/wiki/Energy "Energy") boost equivalent to [the Mitre of Holiness](/wiki/The_Mitre_of_Holiness "The Mitre of Holiness").

## Legacy

When the Monk role was first included in [vanilla](/wiki/Vanilla "Vanilla"), in [NetHack 3.3.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.0 "NetHack 3.3.0"), the quest artifact was the arguably more desirable [Eyes of the Overworld](/wiki/Eyes_of_the_Overworld "Eyes of the Overworld"), which grant a new property: [astral vision](/wiki/Astral_vision "Astral vision"). The earliest versions of [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") adapted the 3.3.0 code, so the Mantle was supplanted by the Eyes in the [SLASH](/wiki/SLASH "SLASH") lineage as well.

At present, the Mantle's only appearance in an active variant is in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), where it is the quest artifact for [the deferred Psion role](/wiki/Deferred_and_defunct_features_\(SlashTHEM\) "Deferred and defunct features (SlashTHEM)"). In an improvement on the original, the Mantle now grants [half physical damage](/wiki/Half_physical_damage "Half physical damage") while worn. ESP is now a benefit of wearing the Mantle, and magic resistance a benefit of carrying it. When invoked it provides an energy boost.

In addition to increasing the wearer's wisdom and intelligence, as a helm of brilliance, the Mantle granted magic resistance and extrinsic ESP while carried. When invoked, the Mantle gave an energy boost equivalent to the Mitre of Holiness.

Legacy

When the Monk role was first included in vanilla, in NetHack 3.3.0, the quest artifact was the arguably more desirable Eyes of the Overworld, which grant a new property: astral vision. The earliest versions of SLASH'EM adapted the 3.3.0 code, so the Mantle was supplanted by the Eyes in the SLASH lineage as well.

At present, the Mantle's only appearance in an active variant is in SlashTHEM, where it is the quest artifact for the deferred Psion role. In an improvement on the original, the Mantle now grants half physical damage while worn. ESP is now a benefit of wearing the Mantle, and magic resistance a benefit of carrying it.
